references: Related: CF 275775. Amending: Ord 90789, Ord 101720, Ord 78444, Ord 83017.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing accumulated and unused sick leave benefits for certain City officers and employees acquiring vested rights to a retirement allowance under the City Employees' Retire System and amending Sections 1 and 1.1 of Ordinance 90789.
